data.name: who-are-we-content
data.value: Welcome! We, Stanislaw Nieradko (XXLO IIb1) and Blazej Sak (XXLO IIc1), know that the information about substitution reaches us, students, too slowly. We decided to do something about it. For this reason we created eru. A platform to quickly send information about substitutions to all interested students. We hope that you will like our platform and enjoy using it. Greetings,

data.name: get-started-1
data.value: Getting started is very simple! Just select one of available platforms that we support (we can provide support for a variety of platforms, if the one you're using is missing, reach out to us! We'll gladly help you with that ;)) With every platform we've created a simple intruction how to subscribe to notifications. Usually you just need to start a conversation with our bot.

data.name: get-started-2
data.value: Please note that we do NOT store any unnecessary data about you. We don't have access to your first name, last name, profile picture or anything else. Everything we know about you is your anonymous ID used by platform API and your class. However as soon as you unregister from our services we'll gladly delete this data ASAP.

data.name: help-info
data.value: This project couldn't be possible without a help and support from XXLO's deputy director Kamil Żmudziński. We sincerely thank him for all the support!

data.name: help-details
data.value: Have you experienced any bug? Do you have any idea for a feature that might be useful? Reach out to us! Simply create a new issue on GitHub or write to us by email eru@2137420.xyz!
